description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

Your enhanced senses grow even more discerning. Your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#blindsense]{Blindsense} becomes @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#blindsight]{Blindsight} with a range of 60 feet. If you have @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#darkvision]{Darkvision}, its range increases by 30 feet. You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.zHvk8K9j9J16Pq7d]{Enhanced Senses} exploit to learn this exploit.
